settings.title: AtomStack Reward Program
settings.content: We deeply value every individual who has supported us on AtomStack's journey. That's why we've introduced a special reward program for our website users. There are various ways for you to earn AtomStack Points, and these Points can be used for your future orders and exclusive official promotions. It's our way of expressing gratitude to our loyal supporters.
settings.button_text: Click Here to Open Reward Program Popup and Join!

settings.content: HOW TO EARN ATOMSTACK POINTS?

settings.title: 1 Point For Every $1
settings.content: For every purchase of any machine, accessory, or consumable Materials, you will earn credits. Each dollar spent will reward you with 1 AtomStack point.

settings.title: Share on Social Media
settings.content: Sharing AtomStack products on social media grants you 200 Points. Additionally, when your friends complete a purchase using the 10% OFF Coupon, you will also receive 1000 points as a reward.

settings.title: Sign Up and Subscribe
settings.content: Registering an account on the AtomStack official website or subscribing to our newsletter not only grants you a complimentary 200 AtomStack Points but also ensures you receive the latest updates on AtomStack's new products and exclusive promotional offers right at your fingertips.

settings.title: Review Our Products
settings.content: After using AtomStack products, leaving a review on our official website will earn you a generous reward of 200 AtomStack Points. If your review includes images, you'll receive an additional 200 Points as a token of our appreciation.
